backend/main.mo: Actor canister implementing user profiles, access control, and social features such as friend requests and friendships.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that performs a no-op state migration on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles and UI functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, admin status, server/room selection, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/chat/EmojiPicker: Emoji picker component with categorized emoji lists and popover UI for message composition.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog listing friends with profile previews and an action to invite them to a room using room member APIs.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message input component supporting text, emojis, image/video attachments, previews, validation, and message submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Fetches and displays room messages with profile previews and actions for edit, delete, pin, and compose messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Displays and manages rooms and servers including creation, deletion, renaming, and selection UI.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomMemberL: Shows room members with presence, roles, and controls for assigning roles or kicking users, with profile data integration.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Dialog UI for viewing friends and searching users, with cards that load and display profiles or fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing the caller’s profile, supporting avatar color selection, image upload, and saving changes.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileN: Simple component that renders a user profile’s display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial setup dialog for creating a user profile with name, bio, and avatar color selection.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileV: Dialog that displays a user's profile, falling back to auto‑generated data when unavailable.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar using a profile picture or colored initials with fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerAn: Thread UI for listing, creating, editing, pinning, and deleting server announcements with author profiles.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerAv: Displays a server’s icon or falls back to initials with styled avatar rendering.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerCh: Renders the main server chat interface with tabs for chat and server details, fetching announcements, members, and updating presence. Includes a side member list panel and presence updates every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerMe: Displays a scrollable list of server members with profiles, activity status, and moderation dialogs, though kick/ban/role actions are not yet supported.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerVi: Provides server customization UI for owners, including avatar, banner, bio, and accent color uploads with progress tracking. Handles image validation, uploads, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Implements a settings modal for theme, polling interval, alt‑account management, and admin status, using multiple hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoicePanel: Manages joining and handling a voice session using WebRTC, including mic permission, peer connection setup, signaling, and ICE candidate exchange.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to query and claim admin status using the actor, with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAltAccounts.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, linking, accepting, and removing alternate accounts, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Hooks to list, fetch, create, and delete chat rooms using actor methods and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Provides hooks for searching users, managing friends, and sending or accepting friend requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity auth provider and hook to manage login, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Mutation hook to add a user to a room and invalidate the room list.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Hooks to fetch, post, edit, delete, and pin room messages with polling and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomPresence.ts: Hooks to fetch room member presence, update presence, and send periodic presence heartbeats.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomRoles.ts: Hooks to get room members with roles and to assign roles or kick members, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerChat.ts: Hooks for retrieving, posting, editing, deleting, and pinning server announcements plus presence updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerCustomizatio: React Query hooks for getting and updating server bio, banner, and accent color via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useServerMembers.ts: Hooks to fetch active server members and wrap them with profile data, including fallback profile handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useServers.ts: Provides hooks to list, create, delete servers, and update server icons using the actor API and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty placeholder file for user preference hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, including caller profile and individual profiles with caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceSession.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating voice session state, including session start/end and WebRTC signaling operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light, dark, and black theme tokens and component styling variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/altAccountSwitch.ts: Session storage helpers for tracking alternate account switch intent.
frontend/src/utils/flags.ts: Empty placeholder for feature flag utilities.
frontend/src/utils/principalDisplay.ts: Utility functions for generating display names and initials from principal strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, extended fonts, and a large set of theme color tokens using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the TerrorChat app’s state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for build planning.
